short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pin sticky notes to elements on your website. Manage them by adding/editing/removing notes from context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pin sticky notes to elements on your website by selecting the desired text and choosing "Create note for selected text" from the context menu. Manage your by adding/editing/removing notes from context menu. Sync your data with Firebase by pasting databaseURL in "Settings" tab.
